properties.name: Birmingham-Southern College
properties.description: Posted by Aclipscomb1985-1989, I went to college here and lived here September-May. Met my wife here, too.

properties.name: Cross and Sword
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombAfter my Jr year of college, I worked here for a summer.

properties.name: First Atlanta Address
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombAtlanta, GASomewhere near here, we lived for a couple of years when I was young. My first concrete memories - literally, in the case of the time I slipped on the wet pavement and had to get stitches in my chin.

properties.name: Flint Hill
properties.description: Posted by Aclipscomb17 acres, a nice little farm. My folks lived there until 2004. I was there all through high school and college (when I wasn\'t off at school)

properties.name: Less than 1 year
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombWoodland, gaRight after we moved from Atlanta, we lived her for about 8 months (my mom lived here longer, as she was working as a public health nurse in the county while my brothers and I finished out the school year. 1981

properties.name: Lived here for a summer
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombAfter my sophomore year. My brother was renting a warehouse. Pretty nasty place.

properties.name: We got married in this church
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombIt was a nice wedding.

properties.name: We lived here for a long time
properties.description: Posted by Aclipscomb1147 Reeder Circle, Atlanta, GAFirst address I remember, first phone number - we lived here until I finished 8th grade.

properties.name: Where I was born
properties.description: Posted by AclipscombNashville, TNRoughly, that is. I was very young at the time, and didn\'t write down the address.
